text:
There is a GNU only command line option "bison" in the mod_ssl.dsp/mak files 
which will not let me continue while compiling in visual C++ pro version 5.0
creator: dkrause@telusplanet.net

text:
You need to install Bison 1.28. You can get it from 
http://unxutils.sourceforge.net/
creator: juan.rivera@citrix.com

text:
To compile Apache win32, with mod_ssl, you will need the following tools: awk, 
bison, flex, and sed.  You can get these by d/l cygwin.  You will need to 
select the individual tools in different categories.  I think two of them are 
std, the other two you need to select.  You will also need to delete awk, and 
rename gawk to awk(the 1st one is a link that does not work under cmd.exe)

towerofpower@operamail.com
creator: towerofpower@operamail.com
